name: Big Data Tools
description:
With this plugin, you can conveniently work with Zeppelin notebooks,, monitor Spark and Hadoop applications, and preview AWS S3, Google Cloud Storage, Minio, Linode, Digital Open Space, Microsoft Azure, and Hadoop Distributed File System files right from IntelliJ-based IDEs including IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate, PyCharm Professional, and DataGrip.


For Zeppelin notebooks written in Scala, the plugin offers smart navigation, code completion, inspections & quick-fixes, and refactorings inside the notebooks. You can browse, create, and run Zeppelin notebooks without leaving the IDE. If your Zeppelin server is using a Spark cluster, or you configured a Spark cluster separately in the plugin settings, the plugin will allow you to track Spark jobs, see cluster environment and storage information from the IDE. With ZTools, you can view details of the variables as you execute your notebooks, and can get smart completion for data frame columns in SQL and Scala.


You can also upload, download, and preview large structured files in tabular form, including CVS, Parquet, AVRO, and ORC formats.
notes:
Changes in EAP 9

Features:

  • Hadoop monitoring
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-939
  • Support for Azure storage blob on par with GCS and S3-compatibles.
  • Support for S3-compatible object storage services: Linode, Minio, and Digital Ocean Spaces
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-668
  • Ability to work with AVRO and ORC files formats
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-806, https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-807
  • Custom endpoints for S3
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-613
  • Go To Paragraph action for Zeppelin notes
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-950
  • Ability to copy notes to the project directory
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-998
  • ZTools: New Variable View feature (uses ZTools server-side library) allows investigating values of variables between paragraphs execution in Apache Zeppelin notebooks.
  • New File Chooser for saving file parts to remote file systems.
  • Added “Remove connection” button to BDT Panel
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-347

Bugs fixed:

  • Fixed a self-signed certificate error for S3
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-860
  • Resolved empty string folder names in HDFS on Windows
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-912
  • Fixed encoding in CSV file schemes in BDT Panel
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-889
  • UI improvements for tree items alignment in BDT Panel
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-895
  • Fixed new connection creation with hotkey from BDT Panel
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-902
  • Resolved infinite download indicator when viewing CSV files in Data Grip
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-874
  • Better tab names for csv files viewer
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-905
  • Zeppelin: Detailed information about running cells in execution manager
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-987
  • Performance tweaks in notebooks with multiple charts on macOS
    https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/BDIDE-884
  • Problem with lost connection on long-pending/running paragraphs with https connections to Zeppelin. Add silent reconnect on connection lost
